get.summary: Download the documentation as a PDF file.

post.summary: Obtain records in EMBL flatfile format with max limit of 10000 accessions per request

get.summary: Perform a text search and download data in EMBL flat file format.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: The ENA data domain to search against. Is mandatory.

parameters.name: result
parameters.description: The result type (data set) to search against. Is mandatory.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: A set of search keywords joined by logical operators (AND, OR, NOT). Is mandatory.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: How many records to skip from the beginning in the results. Default value is 0.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of records to retrieve. Default value is 100,000. If the full result set is to be fetched, the limit should be set to 0.

parameters.name: gzip
parameters.description: Whether to download the result as a gzip file. By default, this is false.

get.summary: Get links (related ENA records) and download sequence data in EMBl flatfile format.

parameters.name: linksResult
parameters.description: The result type of the record to get links for. Links can only be retrieved for 'study', 'sample' or 'taxon' result types. Is mandatory.

parameters.name: result
parameters.description: The result type of the links to get. Is mandatory.

parameters.name: accession
parameters.description: The accession of the record to get links for. Is mandatory.

parameters.name: subtree
parameters.description: Whether to include links for taxon subtree as well.

parameters.name: gzip
parameters.description: Whether to download the result as a gzip file. By default, this is false.

get.summary: Perform a warehouse search and download data in EMBl flatfile format.

parameters.name: result
parameters.description: The result type (data set) to search against. Is mandatory.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: A set of search conditions joined by logical operators (AND, OR, NOT) and bound by double quotes.

parameters.name: includeAccessions
parameters.description: A list of accessions that you would like to be included with the results of your query

parameters.name: includeAccessionType
parameters.description: The accession type to include accessions

parameters.name: excludeAccessions
parameters.description: A list of accessions that you would like to be excluded from the results of your query

parameters.name: excludeAccessionType
parameters.description: The accession type to exclude accessions

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: How many records to skip from the beginning in the results. Default value is 0.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of records to retrieve. Default value is 100,000. If the full result set is to be fetched, the limit should be set to 0.

parameters.name: gzip
parameters.description: Whether to download the result as a gzip file. By default, this is false.

parameters.name: savedSearch
parameters.description: The id to download the results of a previously submitted search. If this parameter is set, all additional parameters are ignored.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: A list of fields (comma separated) to be returned in the result. If none supplied, the accession and description/title of the main result object will be returned.

parameters.name: sortFields
parameters.description: A list of fields (comma separated) in the order of which the results should be sorted.

parameters.name: rule
parameters.description: Rule ID / Name

parameters.name: dataPortal
parameters.description: The data portal ID. Defaults to 'ena'.

parameters.name: dccDataOnly
parameters.description: Whether to limit the search to only DCC records. By default, all public data is also included in the search.

parameters.name: includeMetagenomes
parameters.description: Whether to include public metagenome data in the search. By default, these are not included. Note that any metagenome data associated with a DCC hub will always be included in a search against that DCC.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: What format the results should be returned as: TSV (Tab Separated Values) or JSON. By default, a TSV report is provided.

parameters.name: download
parameters.description: Whether to download the result as a file, rather than read it from the stream. By default, this is false.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Submit search and be notified via email when search result is ready for downloading. Mandatory if fields=all is set.

get.summary: Perform a text search and download data in EMBL flat file format.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: The ENA data domain to search against. Is mandatory.

parameters.name: result
parameters.description: The result type (data set) to search against. Is mandatory.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: A set of search keywords joined by logical operators (AND, OR, NOT). Is mandatory.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: How many records to skip from the beginning in the results. Default value is 0.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of records to retrieve. Default value is 100,000. If the full result set is to be fetched, the limit should be set to 0.

parameters.name: gzip
parameters.description: Whether to download the result as a gzip file. By default, this is false.

get.summary: Obtain records in EMBL flatfile format

parameters.name: accession
parameters.description: single accession, range or comma separated list

parameters.name: download
parameters.description: Whether to download the result as a file. By default, this is false.

parameters.name: lineLimit
parameters.description: Limit the number of text lines returned. Returns full text by default or if lineLimit=0.

parameters.name: annotationOnly
parameters.description: Get annotation data only, without the sequence.

parameters.name: expanded
parameters.description: Get expanded record for CON sequences.

parameters.name: gzip
parameters.description: Whether to download the result as a gzip file. By default, this is false.

parameters.name: set
parameters.description: Only applicable for contigsets (WGS/TSA/TLS). Whether to download the  full set of sequences as opposed to the master record only. For FASTA format, set is returned by default for contigsets.

post.summary: Obtain records in FASTA file format with max limit of 10000 accessions per request
